markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Advanced Bow Training](/Feats.aspx?ID=1887) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 157 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Archer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=47)

**Prerequisites**
[Archer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1885)

</column>

---

Through constant practice and the crucible of experience, you increase your skill with advanced bows. You gain proficiency with all advanced bows as if they were martial weapons in the [bow](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=3) weapon group.
name: Advanced Bow Training
